Class AbstractWritableDataAccessComponent<T,T1 extends Resource>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.logitopia.jmortar.core.persistence.dao.component.impl.AbstractDataAccessComponent<T1>
      • com.logitopia.jmortar.core.persistence.dao.component.impl.AbstractWritableDataAccessComponent<T,T1>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - The type of model that this component is dealing with.
    T1 - The type of domain resource that will be used by this DAC.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    WritableDataAccessComponent<T>
    Direct Known Subclasses:

    public abstract class AbstractWritableDataAccessComponent<T,T1 extends Resource>
extends AbstractDataAccessComponent<T1>
implements WritableDataAccessComponent<T>
    An abstract implementation of the WritableDataAccessComponent
